Bar√ßa: a new player targeted in defense?
Bar√ßa continues to ogle young talent. After the purchase of gold at F. de Jong last summer, the Blaugrana want to expand their central defense. They would think of recruiting Santiago Ramos Mingo, a 17-year-old player from Boca Juniors.
